Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Akemi ><
Reviews.Content: We bought this add-on camera with the monitor so now we have 2 cameras. I work at home and this monitor has helped me alot giving me the reassurance to focus on my work. Having 2 cameras instead of the 1 makes it easier because I do not need to move the camera around now (my son's room at night, the living during the day...) I just keep the two cameras in the same spot and cycle through the channels on the monitor to see either views on the cameras.One monitor can be paired up to 4 add-on cams, but unforunately one single add-on cam can NOT be paired to two monitors. It would be nice if it could be done so my husband could see the same cameras too.

Reviews.Title: additional cameras
Reviews.Author: Bernard Elwell
Reviews.Content: These cameras were a great addition to the original startup kit. It took use let than 3 minutes to set up and it worked right away. We have 3 cameras setup now and we have every corner of our house, one in our bedroom, one in the playroom, and one in living room. I'm glad there were no interference issues having so many wireless cams set up in such a small place!

Reviews.Title: not good for monitoring two at the same time
Reviews.Author: Cornelius0902
Reviews.Content: My husband chose this monitor because of price and reviews. I would give the base unit with one camera 4 stars, but am only going to give this second camera unit 3 stars. I specifically wanted a monitor so we could keep an eye on both kids, You can do that with this monitor, but you can only watch/listen to one at a time. So once we move the baby to her own room, I will have to choose which child to have the receiver set to at night while we sleep. I would prefer a receiver that could automatically switch between cameras when either child made noise, rather than be committed to one channel.

Reviews.Title: Got this to keep eye on 90 year old Dad I care for
Reviews.Author: Mel Sprink "Mel"
Reviews.Content: Dad is 90 - he has dementia and does not have sense of time so he gets up at night and will sit in a chair in the kitchen waiting for dinner all night or can't find the bathroom some night. My bedroom is on another floor so I have a camera on his bed and monitor eye level on my nightstand if I notice ( I wake several ties a night anyhow for some reason) he has been out of bed for a extensive time I go find him and put him back to bed. This system had such a clear picture even in the dark - I can check to see if he is still breathing (hey he is 90 sometimes I worry) also has sound so I can hear if he is coughing or in distress but the sound turns itself off when he is quiet so it does not keep me awake - triggers only when he is restless, gives me peace of mind and a better nights sleep.

Reviews.Title: Camera Monitor
Reviews.Author: Tammy O
Reviews.Content: Absolutely LOVE this product.  A very inexpensive yet very worthwhile investment. You can see and hear baby, and the screen is color in the day and b/w at night.  VERY good reception and picture :)

Reviews.Title: nice system
Reviews.Author: Amanda Herbert "mascon"
Reviews.Content: Pairs easily with the main unit and works without any problems. I bought 2 of these so I've got channel 1, 2 and 3 set up with the cameras and they work just as expected. Now I finally have 'eyes' around the house.

Reviews.Title: GREAT Product at a GREAT Price!
Reviews.Author: Gumfamily7
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before purchasing this product. I have two children with epilepsy (10 & 9), and night time monitoring has become a MUST if my husband and I are to ever sleep without them in our room!! My daughters room is next to ours and joining the unit was super simple and the picture quality is great. We purchased a second camera for my sons room. His room is downstairs and has full cedar walls, I wasn't optimistic that the camera would get a good signal. I was wrong, it works perfect! Hands down one of the best purchases I have made. It is easy to use, provides good picture and sound, and it was a GREAT price too! I would highly recommend this product to others!

Reviews.Title: Best Camera on the market for price
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: I love this camera system.  A friend of mine paid $300 for a similar system and the resolution is better on this product.  The camera activates once the baby makes a noise.  I bought an extra camera to keep in another location.  The only downside to purchasing the second camera is that the monitor must be on either camera 1 or camera 2, so if there is action in camera 2, you have to switch it over, it won't automatically switch.  So, it may not be good for 2 infants, you would need to separate monitors to keep an eye on both.  Overall, one of the better investments I have made!

Reviews.Title: Does not work for monitoring multiple rooms overnight
Reviews.Author: Aaron  Lee
Reviews.Content: You have to manually toggle between the cameras.  It does not have any funtionality to scan between cameras automatically. So if you're goal is monitoring multiple rooms simultaniously, this will not work.

Reviews.Title: Purchased a second one!
Reviews.Author: Jody
Reviews.Content: We use this in our duplex loft to monitor our children, we have one pointed at each crib.  Works well, easy to configure.  Only drawback is the receiver is set up to have 4 cameras so if you do not have 4, then you need to cycle through them until you get to the one you are looking for. Voice activator does not work well with the A/C on, but for the price point it is great and we have been using it for over a year. Holds a charge for a long time as well and works through walls with no problem.

Reviews.Title: Love it so much I'm buying a second one
Reviews.Author: Linda Mangrum
Reviews.Content: This is a fabulous monitor for the price!  I have two cameras that connect to the same monitor so I can check on any baby at any time (I have 4 kids.)  The antenna broke, only with minor injuries, on one of the cameras and it still broadcasts a clear picture with no problem.  The monitor will support up to 4 cameras so you don't have to keep buying monitors.  The camera and monitor have lasted for almost two years now so I bought another one for our new baby.If you want a sharp picture to where you can see your baby breathe, this isn't the camera for you.  If you want a good camera/monitor for a good price with a pretty darn good picture, then this one is for you.

Reviews.Title: keep an eye out
Reviews.Author: vincent
Reviews.Content: Love these, great value. So far we have one in our baby daughter's room, one in the infant son's room, and planning on getting one for the shower, one for the wife's closet, and some for the front and rear home entry doors.

Reviews.Title: Best video baby monitor on the market
Reviews.Author: E. Roberts
Reviews.Content: We purchased thr addon after we were so impressed with the orginal monitor. We have twins and wanted a monitor that was reliable and we could see and hear our 5 month old at night.  These were easy to set up and I love all the features.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: crispy
Reviews.Content: I did enough research on the internet to find the best monitor for value, and it came out to this Infant Optics monitor. We could finally sleep with peace after having this monitor. We have 3kids, so we needed a video monitor that could give us 3 cameras. Intially I thought that I had to spend hundreds of dollars to get what we need, but we ended getting everything for just $260. This is a great deal for a great product.

Reviews.Title: A nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: This camera setup has a decent screen, does well in low light, and holds a charge fairly well. The range is good as well, as I can monitor the baby even from the garage. I haven't tried other brands, but I'd recommend this model.EDIT 6-24-2013We still use this regularly and it works great. I'd buy another if I needed to. Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
Reviews.Author: USAFwife_Cjsmommy
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this extra camera! Clear picture even in night vision mode,I would recommend this to anyone looking for a camera monitor!

Reviews.Title: video monitor
Reviews.Author: gloria
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and use.  Volume doesn't seem to work very well, tho the video does.  Good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Piece of mind
Reviews.Author: CCR
Reviews.Content: This camera is so wonderful!  I've had it about 4 months now and never had a problem with it.  Some people complain about it turning on in the night... That's kind of the point...  I keep it on all night, not on power save mode, so I don't have to worry about being woken up by it unless my baby is crying or moving around a lot- and that is why I have a camera in the first place!  The screen is pretty bright, so it is best to keep a little distance from your bed.  I love being able to watch my guy whenever I want to check on him.  It is also fun to watch my 9 month old play in there when he wakes up from a nap.  So cute!  I would recommend this to anyone!

Reviews.Title: OK for the price
Reviews.Author: Krystal "Krystal"
Reviews.Content: This camera was added onto my one camera system that I bought at the same time.  I do not like that the monitor does not voice activate to either camera, just the channel you are currently on.  I was also bummed that there was no stand to angle the camera down like with the main system.

Reviews.Title: Feels cheap in you hands but does the job
Reviews.Author: Clinton Hull D.O.
Reviews.Content: The monitor for this is very lightweight and it has been knocked down several times because of this.  The picture and sound are as expected.  If they would beef up the monitor this would be a solid 4 maybe 5 star product

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: WolfQueen13
Reviews.Content: These add on cams are very easy to set up & connect to the monitor. I ordered 2 of them & an extra cam & monitor combo in case the old one gives out. Of the 2 of these one didnt work from the start as the lense wouldnt adjust & the image was very blurry. I filed an exchange with Amazon, & I received my replacement promptly within a few days :). All cams are now working well, & I get great signal in my den which is near the center of the house so if the monitor goes off I can hear it from every room. I actually use the cams in my barn because I breed goats so I keep these out there for safety (there are coyotes in the area) & to keep an eye on pregnant does that are near kidding (it saves me all of the back & forth trips so I can get stuff done inside lol). Anyways while this is a baby monitor the point is that my barn is 50+ feet from one end of my house & I still get great signal strength & a clear picture even in bad weather & wind. I also think the price is very reasonable. I highly recommend this for whatever you plan to use it for.

Reviews.Title: Great, Easy Addition
Reviews.Author: Cory Rawls "-Cory"
Reviews.Content: Very easy to connect to the base camera. The cameras are a bit limited in the angles you can put them. But for the price point you can't beat this system. Especially when it is so easily expanded.

Reviews.Title: So handy!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We purchased one additional camera to go with the base unit and we were so happy that we did.  I work away from home 3 days a week and I take my son with me, so the monitor goes too.  It's so nice just to take the "extra" camera instead of having to reposition the single one all the time.  It's also really nice when we watch my niece and we can monitor both kids taking naps in separate rooms.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Krystle M Bowen
Reviews.Content: PROS:Easy Set-UpWorks GreatCONS:It doesn't automatically cycle through the cameras, you have to manually go through them.We have a very loud white noise machine in our twins room. This monitor picks up the boys over that without being overly loud.So far so good!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Dan in Omaha
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this system including the add on cam.  It works great in complete darkness across the room 10 feet.  Closer and daylight gives a very sharp color image.  VOX and Auto Mute modes save on monitor battery, but we leave it plugged in most of the time anyway which I would strongly recommend...not sure it would get through the night if you didn't have VOX activated and left the monitor on all night.  Great range and adjustable screen brightness.  This system is priced perfectly compared to several other models out there. No wifi connectivity, but this system is portable and effective whereever you go.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Corina Caplan
Reviews.Content: Product worked very well for about 10 months.  Then the AC adapter suddenly broke (no fraying or other signs of damage visible) and the monitor would not charge.  I called customer service, and they were very responsive and helpful.  I received a new adapter a few days later and everything's working well again.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: soccer
Reviews.Content: This is an additional camera you can add onto your main unit so that you can have multiple cameras. Extremely easy to install and synch up with your main unit. I have one camera mounted on the wall above my daughters crib and use this extra camera to move about the house depending on where she is and where I need to watch her from.  Its great! Definitely recommend getting at least 2 cameras with this unit! They work great!

Reviews.Title: Not for use in 2+ kid home.
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I bought this add on to my current camera when I had our second baby (already had a 2 yr old) and wanted to be able to see and hear both kids throughout the night. It connected and worked with my current system just fine, but as a previous poster commented, the voice activated only works with the camera you are currently on. I contacted Infant Optics and they were very helpful, insofar as to tell me it was a bug in the software and that it wouldn't be resolved any time soon. I would not recommend this for anyone who wants to use two or more cameras at the same time.

Reviews.Title: Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: scott1975
Reviews.Content: There is no audio only monitoring mode, so you have to leave the video on to monitor for sounds during the night.  This burns out the batteries on the handset in less than a day.  Also, you have to cycle through all 4 channels when you have multiple cameras regardless of how many cameras you have, with a warning beep every time you cycle to one of the unused channels.  This can be pretty annoying in the middle of the night.  The quality of the video is good, and the infrared light works well allowing you to see whats going on when it is dark.

Reviews.Title: Its fine.
Reviews.Author: tli392
Reviews.Content: Works fine. I've never had any problems with it. Any issues I have with this product are related to this monitor system as a whole and not the add-on camera. Picture is not as crisp as my old Summer Infant Day & Night monitor.

Reviews.Title: An extra camera
Reviews.Author: Flamto89
Reviews.Content: Got this camera to the DXR5 so that I have an extra camera in the kitchen. It's easy to add this camera to channel 2 as long as you follow the instructions step by step. The parent unit still cycles through the empty channel 3 and 4 (just gives a blue blank screen) but other than that it's exactly what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Why did you design this with a power button?
Reviews.Author: JRP
Reviews.Content: Got a few of these to add to my DXR-5 system.  I would say it's a good value for a video monitor with basic features and works pretty well,The only design flaw I see so far is that the cameras have on/off switches.  These are not-battery powered so a power cord is required.  So WHY would you need any sort of power switch?  If you are paranoid that big brother is watching then unplug the cord.  The only reason I can see that they designed this with a momentary power switch is to annoy you when the power goes out during the night, power comes back on but the cameras will not turn on until you go into your sleeping kids' rooms and press the dumb buttons.  Whomever field tested this idea needs an early retirement.

Reviews.Title: Wish system flipped to whichever camera was activated automatically
Reviews.Author: Arakashi "Arakashi"
Reviews.Content: It's just like the first camera. It works fine, not the best camera out there but for the price it works and does its job.What's inane about this whole system though is that the system doesn't automatically switch to whichever camera is activated when in VOX mode. Eg, I have a camera on each of my kids, in separate rooms. However, VOX mode only works on one camera at a time. So if I choose to have the system on kid a in BOX mode and then kid b cries, the system doesn't flip over to kid b.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: MR M VAN HORCK
Reviews.Content: Great value for money.This is what any parent needs.I bought an extra camera and can easily monitor both my kids in light or dark conditions.

Reviews.Title: Moniter is great, however a little interference.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Been very impressed with the monitor however it does cause interference with other wireless devices.  It runs on a 2.4 ghz frequency so anything else on that, that might be close to the monitor will stop working.  For example, I have to turn the monitor off to use my wireless printer.  We switched my computer to a 5 ghz frequency since I was having issues with internet while the monitor was on.  The instructions that come with it admit that this is an issue, but state you just have to move the monitor away from the devices and the other devices will work.  I have not found this to be true.  My husband can have the monitor on upstairs and I will have wireless issues downstairs on my ipad.  It's not enough of an issue for us, so that is why I still am giving this monitor 5 stars.  The picture is great as well as the sound!  Overall very happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Simple and Great
Reviews.Author: Stacy
Reviews.Content: Everything works great on it...however using multiple cameras the audio alert etc only works for the camera you have selected at the time.  If a child on the other camera not being watched makes noise it doesn't alert you.  Other than that, it is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Summertime1979
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price.  Our bedroom is on a different level than our young childrens' bedrooms.  So I bought this and two of the extra cameras to place in their room so I can hear and see them when we are upstairs in our room. They are awesome. They work great. I can't believe this is only $99?!?!?!  The additional cameras were $79 each, but they are worth it, too! Easy to mount, great picture, no interference so far in the reception. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this video system.
Reviews.Author: D. Bourn "AmazonMama"
Reviews.Content: We have used this video monitor system for two years now, with three different cameras (three rooms=3 cameras).We do go through chargers though. After about six months they stop working. But for less than ten bucks every six months for consistent monitor usage over two years (16 hours a day) I'd say that's not that bad.

Reviews.Title: jcp64
Reviews.Author: jcp64
Reviews.Content: I ordered an add-on camera for our 2nd grandson, but haven't used it yet because he's not here.  His due date is today, but not sure when he'll arrive.  LOVE the original and look forward to being able to see 2 babies sleeping! :)

Reviews.Title: Not good quality
Reviews.Author: Braydon Bailey
Reviews.Content: Can't find a connection even a few feet away.  When a connection is found it is okay but I can't trust it.  I gave up using it because it isn't dependable.  Wouldn't buy this again.  I went back to using a monitor I bought 7 years ago and haven't had a problem.

Reviews.Title: Fine for our limited use
Reviews.Author: Louise Eighmie Turner
Reviews.Content: It enables us to monitor my 103 year old mother when she goes to bed. She was fully ambulatory until she broke her leg a few months ago. She cannot remember that she now needs help getting up to use the bathroom thus the need for monitoring. The price of this makes it a good value. The camera quality is very good. We bought 2 monitors but are using only one right now. The house we are in now is not a good barometer for testing resistance to wifi and other interference or for testing the distance one can take the monitor from the camera. In a few weeks when we go to our house for the summer we will be using both cameras and testing interference and distance. Since we use the monitor relatively few hours at a time we don't really have a good sense of how long the charge holds. But so far the product meets our needs and we have no complaints. We also never have used a monitor (except the ones that provide sound) so we have no comparison to make.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Kauspedas
Reviews.Content: Bought this and another camera. Easy to setup, work great. Night vision is pretty cool too. And when the kids grow up I'll have some wireless cameras to play with.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: William Colavolpe "Wil"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product to extend the monitor and I enjoy it. The camera does what its suppose to. only complaint is not with the camera but rather the battery life of the monitor. Good product overall.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the price!
Reviews.Author: stacy becker
Reviews.Content: we love it.  It works great for us and the price is excellent.  Our screen to one of our monitors stopped working within the year and customer service was amazing and helped replace the monitor.  I haven't had such great service from someone in awhile and they replaced it for no charge.  Because of that, we had our third child and bought another monitor for his room.  The only downside is that it is a light plastic and can easily break.  Otherwise I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Old technology
Reviews.Author: lbarrus
Reviews.Content: Interferes with house wifi, have to disable in home wifi so the cameras can take over.  Won't talk to my phone via wifi either  ugh, sent it back.  Hopefully they'll come up with an updated version.

Reviews.Title: Has to order 3 to get one that actually worked.
Reviews.Author: Brian Flores
Reviews.Content: I had to return 3, to get one that worked.  LED display was bad, static, etc.  I put up with the return frustration, due to the high marks, and number of good reviews.. and of course.. the low.. low cost.  It was worth it!  Would certainly buy again!  Gave 4 stars due to the poor quality control, and frustration of getting a good working unit.

Reviews.Title: Would never go back to audio only
Reviews.Author: chase g bock
Reviews.Content: These have been great for us.  We used audio only monitors for our first baby and now that we have used this for our second we would never do non-video again.  Haven't had any technical issues besides running over the plug with a car and needing to replace that.  Range is great anywhere in the house, does not go as far as our old audio monitors but haven't really need it to.

Reviews.Title: You don't need any other high priced monitor
Reviews.Author: Claire S.
Reviews.Content: I really like this monitor because I even bought two cameras for it. One is for the swing and the other is attached to the wall for the crib.  For the price, it does its job well. No static sounds and the picture is perfect for light and dark setting.

Reviews.Title: Great Company
Reviews.Author: Chris R.
Reviews.Content: This camera has served us incredibly well. It isn't as fancy as some of the more expensive ones, but it does the job and has thus far been quite durable. We have had it for almost a year and to date we have not had any problems with it.  We were kind of disappointed that the add on camera doesn't come with a stand like the original camera does, so we contacted the company and they sent us one for free, all we had to do was pay for shipping. So far all of our customer service experiences with this company have been very positive (we were confused on how something worked at one point and needed to call them to figure it out and they were very helpful)

Reviews.Title: Love the add-on feature!
Reviews.Author: A. Tadros "Thrift Hound"
Reviews.Content: We bought this, our 2nd add-on camera to our fist camera and monitor, will get 2 more and have a full set monitoring 2 babies at the same time!

Reviews.Title: camera was dead on arrival
Reviews.Author: Aaron Krannawitter
Reviews.Content: I obviously had bought the camera and monitor first. We had problems with our first camera before ever getting a chance to use it. I figured maybe something had happened causing it to break so I went ahead and bought another camera. Pulled it out of the box and the exact same issue, it powered up for about 2 seconds and then I smelt an electrical fire and it powered down. Total piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: Good value.
Reviews.Author: Cheryne Ellis
Reviews.Content: This has been a real help with our twins, I don't have to get out of bed to see if they are okay.

Reviews.Title: Cheap in price but get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Katherine McCarthy
Reviews.Content: Cheap, no features.  Returned it.  Does not adjust angle outside babies room.  Picture quality poor.  It disconnected mu internet as it interferes with wifi.  No zoom

Reviews.Title: Good picture, but sound quality is awful. A lot of other flaws
Reviews.Author: seidhkona
Reviews.Content: We wanted to get a second camera for our existing monitor, but turned out that the model has been discontinued, so we had to look for a new monitor with two cameras. I was looking at Motorola, but didn't want to overpay for the functions I thought I won't use (tilt/pan, room temp), so I decided to go with this simpler and cheaper monitor.Here is the quick summary:pros: the video quality is goodcons: sound quality is HORRIBLE. Even with the sound turned on to the max you can barely hear that your child is crying if you have TV or music turned on, or if you're in the kitchen and have running water. It also has a lot of static noise in the background which makes it really hard to hear what's going on in the nursery.. If you're monitoring a younger baby, it's OK, but my older one likes to talk a lot before falling asleep and after waking up, and I can't understand what she is saying, even when I listen very careful.If you have a few cameras, the monitor won't automatically switch between them when the noise is detected. Right now I have my kids sleeping in separate rooms and I need to constantly manually switch between cameras to check on them.The monitor is very light, in fact it's so ridiculously light that it's own cord drags it down from my nightstand!Camera's cord is very short.I kinda regret now that I decided to save money and went with this option. I wish I could tilt the camera, since we took off the crib rail and my baby gets out of the bed and starts wondering around the room.

Reviews.Title: Excellent little Camera
Reviews.Author: Gman
Reviews.Content: It works as expected.  I am very satisfied with this purchase.  I highly recommend this little camera.  You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Camera Stand Not Included
Reviews.Author: S. Koller "Selene"
Reviews.Content: The DXR-5 video monitor is a great addition to the nursery.  It provides clear day and nighttime viewing.  I purchased this second camera for an additional room.  I am happy with the camera, however it did not come with the white camera stand.  The stand was included in the set, but not with the additional camera.  We will figure out how to attach one to the wall and use just one stand for both units, but it would be nice if it came with its own stand.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, but no stand
Reviews.Author: Michael K. Moore
Reviews.Content: I will not get into great detail on these as I have done a complete review as part of the complete system itself. These add-on cameras are exactly the same as the one included in the system with one major exception: THERE IS NO STAND!!In the system, the camera comes with a white plastic stand that allows you to mount the camera and place at a greater variety of angles. For some reason the add-on cameras do not. I contacted the manufacturer and had to pay $6 per stand. I have 3 add-on cameras so had to shell out $18 for stands.

Reviews.Title: infants Optics add on camera
Reviews.Author: mary e durant
Reviews.Content: bought it for my grandson and wife as their baby had grabbed theirs and it had been broken.  they are very happy and that makes me very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: K. Omo
Reviews.Content: We love the first one we got so when we neededa second camera, it was an easy choice to get the add-on. We like the fact that the camera is in color and it picks up sounds pretty well. Easy to set-up and pair to the monitor. Highly recommended.  I do wish we can pair to multiple monitors too but oh well....

Reviews.Title: Does the job...
Reviews.Author: ECB
Reviews.Content: I think the video quality is terrible compared to our summer infant video monitor...its hard to really see exactly what the babies are doing...its more like a blob on the monitor.  My biggest complaint is that the sound only comes on when it picks up a noise...so for example the monitor sound turns on and off which for a light sleeper can be annoying.  I prefer the monitors that have constant noise monitoring, it makes it easier for the parent to sleep and not get woken up by random perceived noise the monitor is picking up.

Reviews.Title: nice assurance for the money
Reviews.Author: Voracious Reader
Reviews.Content: We had one already, but it only gave us a limited view of the room.  The additional one gives us a view of the entire room, which is peace of mind, should our little one get up in the middle of the night,  The only off-putting thing was that the second one didn't come with a stand.  When I emailed the company about this, they immediately responded, and when I told them I wasn't pleased, they sent us a stand, postage paid, for free.  The company is excellent to work with, and the product delivers as promised as well.

Reviews.Title: very good and cheaper than the stores
Reviews.Author: Pedro "Pedro"
Reviews.Content: Very good product and great gift for those with kids, my friend loved it actually they told me about buying a second camera for their second daughter to come! :)

Reviews.Title: infants optic camera
Reviews.Author: robert skog
Reviews.Content: we have a total of 3 of these cameras and they all perform well, the receiving unit pairs up well , wish the screen was bigger but the camera and vol work well

Reviews.Title: Great, but could be better
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: Our old MobiCam quit working, so we purchased this system. It works so much better & shows no signs of interference with other electronic devices. The reason I didn't give it 5 stars in simply because of the camera range in the dark. We cannot see my son's bed clearly in the dark with the camera positioned on the other side of the room. It's not a big room by any stretch of the imagination. In our baby's room, we can clearly see the crib when the camera is positioned within 5 feet of the crib, but in our son's room, the bed is approximately 10-15 feet from the camera, and with the lights out, you cannot clearly make out anything beyond say 5 feet or so. We positioned several spot-light type night lights around the room & this still did not remedy the problem. I believe we'll have to move the camera above the bed in order to see better. Also, if you don't install batteries into the cameras & the power goes out, you have to set up the whole system again. This is not difficult, but it is also not exactly intuitive - you do need the instructions. Overall we are very happy with this system. Way better than MobiCam & cheaper!

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price and a great buy!
Reviews.Author: Mom of 3
Reviews.Content: For the price it is perfect!  The only down side is it doesn't automatically toggle back between screens, which is why I gave it 4 stars.  It has been perfect for us as a baby monitor as well as a monitor for our play room.

Reviews.Title: Not that great
Reviews.Author: Jeanette Hubbard "ZoBell"
Reviews.Content: wasn't what I was looking for. They are made pretty cheaply. Gave them to someone who was having a child and didn't have anything. They are better than nothing.

Reviews.Title: Very helpful for my purpose.
Reviews.Author: Judy L.
Reviews.Content: A year ago, my 93 year old mother move in with us, and is in an area of the house that we can't watch her at night. Although I stay up all night to keep an eye on her, I couldn't see when she got out of bed. After a couple of times of checking on her and finding her sitting on the floor, we got a couple of these cameras and a monitor. Now I can see when she stirs or gets up and it is also useful to free us up to get things done without having to sit with her. The only downside of this camera is that it interferes with our wireless network. We have worked around this by turning it on only when we need to monitor her. Other than this problem, this camera and monitor have provided us with more freedom in our lives while still monitoring the safety of my mother.

Reviews.Title: No stand, but good second camera.
Reviews.Author: Amanda Young
Reviews.Content: Great camera system, however this second monitor does not come with a stand like the first one. So if you need the stand for the camera you will have to buy that separately.Also if you haven't bought the first camera system... just note that it totally hijacks your wifi.  I have to keep it off until we are done using the internet, Netflix, hulu, etc.

Reviews.Title: Best monitor for under $100
Reviews.Author: Stevo
Reviews.Content: Great camera in day or night vision mode, excellent range for the monitor and easy to set-up right out of the box. Why people pay over $100 for any baby monitoring system is beyond me.You can connect up to 4 cameras for 1 monitor as well. VOX mode that turns off the screen after 3 minutes and mute mode that mutes the volume after 10 seconds if no noise is heard saves the battery and prevents the annoying hum of the microphone.We've had this for 6 months now and have no complaints. Awesome product.

Reviews.Title: Can be better
Reviews.Author: ravikanthreddy yalamuri
Reviews.Content: Camera antenna broke and stopped transmitting..till that point it worked fine. Bought different system that has 2 way communication but I would not recommend as the voice comes out in a scary tone and my kid sits up looking for it!!

Reviews.Title: Great additional camera for our system!
Reviews.Author: Carrie Boring
Reviews.Content: Works like a charm, easy to set up and mount on the wall. Exactly like the one that comes with the original monitor package.

Reviews.Title: Easy add on
Reviews.Author: blujfan9293 "blujfan"
Reviews.Content: Relatively easy, once you get the hang of the pairing and stop turning it off when you mean to change the volume. We could monitor crib and bassinet without having to move one camera

Reviews.Title: i'm happy with it
Reviews.Author: Y. Wong
Reviews.Content: It has all the functions that a mom really needs.  Very easy to set up, nice video quality (and night vision works really well too), the mute/auto silence function works great.  I use it for my twin boys who share the same bedroom.  I have two cameras set up and i can easily switch from one camera to another camera.  It really gives me a peace of mind and i no longer have to guess who's the one crying or coughing.I didn't give it a 5 stars because i think it somehow interferes with my wireless internet.

Reviews.Title: Okay for the price
Reviews.Author: Sinus Sufferer
Reviews.Content: I wanted an inexpensive option for a video monitor, and this was it.  It has very few features and you can't turn the video funtion off if you just want sound, which is a little annoying because the screen is bright and lights up my whole bedroom at night.  Other than that, it suffices for what I need.

Reviews.Title: It's a good item,...
Reviews.Author: MONICA
Reviews.Content: Its a good item for monitoring your babies, really helpfull and the price its fair enough. Funtionally could be better, but its ok.

Reviews.Title: Paired up without problems
Reviews.Author: Brother Al
Reviews.Content: We owned the DXR5 for 4 months and finally decided to pair another camera. This monitor has great night vision and clear image. Unfortunately this model does not offer a panning function. If it did, this monitor would be 100% perfect!

Reviews.Title: It works but I'm not impressed
Reviews.Author: L. Hord "bonny3clyd"
Reviews.Content: I had a Summer video monitor system for like 5 years and when the cord for the monitor finally frayed, I decided to look into something more current.  This one seemed to get good reviews, but after i received it, I was disappointed.  My summer system worked MUCH better than this one did.  I ended up returning it and getting a Lorex home system.  For what you pay for this one, i'd much rather pay a little bit more and get better quality and more features.  I think most of the people who thought this was a great product had never tried other baby monitors so they couldnt see the difference.

Reviews.Title: Excellent monitor
Reviews.Author: steelythunder
Reviews.Content: We connected both cameras onto the monitor and it works without any problems. I originally had an audio monitor and it always paused with long delays when cycling between channels. This has zero delay and you can jump to the next screen instantly. We are very satisfied with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: Lizzzzzard
Reviews.Content: We love this monitor and camera. We have a total 3 cameras to cater for our 3 kids, and we spent less than 300 bucks for the whole set. We nearly have the whole house covered. Although you can not see all the cameras at once, it is very easy to use and switch through the 3 channels.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: 2 rooms monitoring
Reviews.Author: Tanisha
Reviews.Content: We have 2 kids and they both live in their own rooms. We wanted an affordable system that could keep both rooms under watch but wouldn't hurt our wallet too badly. This works perfectly for that. We paid less than 200 in total with free shipping.The video is excellent and delivers at a smooth frame rate.Night vision works very well even in complete darkness.Recommended for parents who want to monitor more than 1 room using only 1 monitor.

Reviews.Title: sound died within 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: water "~~w~~"
Reviews.Content: the price is good, the video is good for our needs, but the sound quit working within a couple of weeks.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Jordan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 2yr old daughter and an extra camera for my soon to be newborn. I have been using it for about 4 months now and it is great. The night vision works great and hasn't given me any issues. If I ever have a third, I will just add on to this unit. Also this one was priced way below many other comparable cameras even without night vision.

Reviews.Title: great monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: Katie Sharon
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research (mostly reviews on Amazon) before we bought this one. The night time image is clear. The screen is a little bright at night in our room (even on the lowest setting) so I usually leave it off and still use just our audio monitor. Our daughter is 16 months, so for the most part the video monitor is just to check on her in the morning and see if she's up yet. We did recently purchase another video system for our new son's room. I haven't hooked it up yet, but am excited about the fact that I can switch between multiple video cameras with a single monitor. The only downside is there is only one monitor. We have a 2 story home and it would be nice to have one upstairs and one down.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Hammer
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure I wanted a camera monitor until my hand me down audio monitor stopped working & my son had his foot stuck in the side of his crib (this was when we were doing the "cry it out" method) I felt like an awful mom, then and there I decided I needed one! So I found this one and it had lots of good reviews.I LOVE IT!!! We can still check on him without going in his room. I can take it with me when I do laundry, go outside or just watching TV. I love that you can turn the volume off and adjust the brightness for nighttime use. The night vision works great too. Great product for a great price. I have used the command tack strips to mount the monitor to the wall. One camera has worked well for us, because we put the camera up high enough so we can see the entire crib, so no need for another camera. A great product, I would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Works great for our needs.
Reviews.Author: emack5
Reviews.Content: I like this camera. The price was reasonable and it does the job. I have 2 cameras set up in my daughters room so I can change angles. I has a clear image and sound. No complaints here.

Reviews.Title: Nice and easy
Reviews.Author: Jeo Jeff
Reviews.Content: This purchase was an addition to our existing DXR5 kit that has one camera. We now have a total of 2 cameras setup at our new home and we love it. It was really easy to pair the new camera up and we can cycle through the channels to see the 2 rooms.The price isn't as good of a value compared to the starter kit but it's still the cheapest addon camera for a digital video monitor!

Reviews.Title: Love,,,
Reviews.Author: Carrie
Reviews.Content: My two year old has developed a seizure disorder. This system is amazing and gives me great peace of mind. Also we have switched her to a toddler bed and got the extra camera. This makes the process so much easier. I greatly recommend this product!!!

Reviews.Title: doesn't scan
Reviews.Author: Amber Goelz
Reviews.Content: If you can't scan between cameras then it's pointless to have 2 cameras. I can't use this at night because I will only be able to hear one child at any given point.

Reviews.Title: It ruined the system
Reviews.Author: Ethansmommy
Reviews.Content: As soon as I added a second camera to the system that already had one, the whole thing went crazy. The monitor doesn't charge anymore and it buzzes loudly when it is plugged in. As soon as I unplug it, it dies. Plus, it doesn't always work there is noise. Yesterday I was with my son downstairs when the baby was sleeping upstairs. I had the monitor and I only noticed the baby had been screaming when I needed to grab something upstairs. Regrets.

Reviews.Title: No upright stand
Reviews.Author: Tina Bertram
Reviews.Content: Doesn't come with the upright stand that the original unit comes with. I need that stand to get a good view of the crib! I can't find it sold separately either.

Reviews.Title: No split screen to view 2 or more cameras.
Reviews.Author: Vicki L. Storfa "big bronco fan"
Reviews.Content: We have 2 cameras set in 2rooms and one monitor but you can not view both rooms at the same time.  You have to go to cam1 then cam2 to view the rooms. There is no sound unless you are on the right view.  This is not helpful in the middle of the night.  Maybe there is a way to have a split screen but I can't figure it out.  It's not helpful to have more than one camera if you can only view one at a time.  This item needs to have a split screen and voice on each so it can monitor the babies.

Reviews.Title: Peice of Explitive!
Reviews.Author: Adam Vincent
Reviews.Content: Terrible reception. Terrible at multiple camera. then there is this annoying dropped reception alarm that goes off that will wake up any sleeping baby because you have to keep monitor about 10 feet from camera to get reception then randomly this loud beep goes off to let you know its not minding the baby instead it has to be so loud as to wake the baby thus Fowling up any schedule you where trying to achieve by using this "Infant Optic" are very "cheap" feeling as well. We bought 3 cameras and 1 monitor. One camera was DOA and the others don't get reception for expletive.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Empire "Dexter"
Reviews.Content: Really like the camera and the monitoring system.  But it does interfere with my wireless on my cellphone. Have to switch to 3G.

Reviews.Title: one monitor, 2 cameras
Reviews.Author: Mila
Reviews.Content: We got this as a gift and we love this monitor set! The video and sound quality is amazing. You can see the room being lit up brightly on the monitor whilst the room is totally dark. We had to refer to the user manual to pair up the second camera but it did not take more than a few minutes to complete all the steps. With a push on the button we can cycle amongst the channels to see our kids. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: My wife ordered this
Reviews.Author: Eric V.
Reviews.Content: 1) the instructions that came with this product must have been written by a 9 year old Chinese foreign exchange student2) Syncing the cameras to the monitor is a PITA3) When working it has a great picture

Reviews.Title: Overrated
Reviews.Author: JonS
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, we were dissatisfied with this product.  If it seems to good to be true, then it probably is... especially at this low price.  The image quality was poor compared to Summer products.  Also it kept beeping in VOX mode and even at other times.  We believe that ours was defective.  There seems to be some nice features like VOX and a longer viewing distance, but it simply did function for our needs (even if we got one that worked properly).We returned this one and looked into Summer products.  Summer was very good to us with customer support.  We decided to purchase a refurbished product from Summer to work in conjunction with our old monitor, which old monitor was still working (although limping along) after 3 years!  After we received a second refurbished product and new battery for the old monitor, we discovered that the refurbished one was not working well, but they refunded our money and gave it to us for free!

Reviews.Title: you get what you paid for
Reviews.Author: honest opinion
Reviews.Content: 2 weeks after purchase camera already not working. very cheap and useless ! should have invested in a good system !

Reviews.Title: BGH
Reviews.Author: Brenda H.
Reviews.Content: The baby isn't born yet so they haven't tried it. Once it's used I'll give a review. I expect it to be good. Now I rate it a 1 star since baby won't be born until Dec 1, expecting date.

Reviews.Title: hello
Reviews.Author: ali
Reviews.Content: I have encountered a lot of problems because of this product have tell its price three times also I requested and after that I found cheaper in other sites informing you of this and rejected the request, but unfortunately has been deducting the amount from my account and also upon the arrival of the Gath that without screen what to do Bkamrh without extensions with regret Siteseemed scares me a lot because of this strange behavior

Included in the box: 1 Infant Optics ADD-ON Camera
